Reviews.Title: Great Picture, decent sound
Reviews.Author: Steven Cutter
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV to replace a counter top model we have had for years on the island in our kitchen. Mounted it to a full motion bracket and can now view from dining area or in the kitchen. Speakers are decent enough for our needs in this location. Samsung quality has been driving our large screen TV for 6 years.

ProductInfo.Features:
2 in 1: HDTV Monitor Combo
USB Media Player
2 HDMI Inputs
Breakthrough Picture Quality
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung T24B350ND 24" 1080p LED-LCD TV - 16:9 - HDTV 1080p - TAA (T24B350ND) -
